levels/index.html/title.description: 1st level: title. Arca is the name of the character in the game. I'm not sure if it can or should be translated.

levels/index.html/hints.left-right.message: This is you! You can move left and right with the <kbd>←</kbd> and <kbd>→</kbd> keys.
levels/index.html/hints.left-right.description: 1st level: tell the player how to move about

levels/index.html/hints.target.message: Move over to this kitten to rescue it. You need to rescue all the kittens you find!

levels/index.html/hints.portal.message: This is a portal. Walk in and press the <kbd>↓</kbd> key to see where it leads!

levels/editing-text.html/hints.jump.message: Try to jump over to this ledge

levels/editing-text.html/hints.edit.message: Uh Oh! You need to make the ledge longer. Click 'Edit' or press the <kbd>E</kbd> key to change the level.

levels/editing-text.html/html.im-a-ledge.description: 2nd level: level content. This must stay approximately the same length for the level to work
2nd level: level content. This must stay approximately the same length for the level to work

levels/creating-elements.html/hint.message: Hmmm... Looks as if we need more boxes. Try editing the level - use the <kbd>E</kbd> key or press the 'Edit' button.

levels/creating-elements.html/html.box-1.description: Space level: content. The writing on the first box

levels/creating-elements.html/html.box-2.description: Space level: content. The writing on the second box

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.a.message: Long long ago, in the times of the ancient Internet, humans lived in a world without kitten gifs.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.b.message: Then, in 345BC (before cats), the Internet arrived.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.d.message: They discovered something that bought great happiness and meaning to their lives... cute, fluffy, animals.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.e.message: They searched the web for more and more; from giant pandas, to playful puppies.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.f.message: Suddenly, kittens grew more popular, and started to appear all over the Internet universe.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.h.message: The kittens didn't care that you, Arca, were an outcast...

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.i.message: ...rejected by the creatures of the internet, and doomed to live in the ancient ruins.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.j.message: In fact, kittens were your only friends.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.k.message: Until one by one, they started going missing...
